text.div:
Ehrlichiosis (Tests for Ehrlichia species Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    24042-4 Ehrlichia chaffeensis DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    27994-3 Ehrlichia chaffeensis DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    48865-0 Ehrlichia ewingii DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    48866-8 Ehrlichia sp DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    49125-8 Ehrlichia sp identified in Unspecified specimen by Sequencing
    87559-1 Ehrlichia chaffeensis groEL gene [Presence] in Blood by NAA with non-probe detection
    87560-9 Ehrlichia canis+ewingii groEL gene [Presence] in Blood by NAA with non-probe detection
    87561-7 Ehrlichia muris-like groEL gene [Presence] in Blood by NAA with non-probe detection
